channel.title: BCCraft Survival Server JOIN NOW!
channel.description:
BCCraft Surival is a Minecraft Server i have put up yesterday.
It is a basic, peaceful survival server with plugins such as factions, and protection plugins to protect your chests and doors. There is also a login plugin, so that no buddy can go on ur in-game acount and destroy or take your belongings, or properties. ( As Soon as you join the server, type /register (yourpassword), then after that type /login (yourpassword)) If you are interested, the ip is bccantech.net:11632
thanks to all who decide to play :D
~Scarface~
